text: The knockout stage of the UEFA Euro 2012 began on June 21, 2012 and ended on July 1, 2012. Eight teams qualified, two from each group. Poland and Ukraine failed to qualify for the knockout stage. == Qualified teams == Group Winners Runners-up A Czech Republic Greece B Germany Portugal C Spain Italy D England France == Results == {{Round8 |21 June – Warsaw||0||1 |23 June – Donetsk||2||0 |22 June – Gdańsk||4||2 |24 June – Kyiv||0 (2)||0 (4) |27 June – Donetsk||0 (2)||0 (4) |28 June – Warsaw||1||2 |1 July – Kyiv||4||0 }} == Quarter-finals == === Czech Republic vs Portugal === \---- === Germany vs Greece === \---- === Spain vs France === \---- === England vs Italy === == Semi-finals == === Portugal vs Spain === \---- === Germany vs Italy === == Final == === Spain vs Italy === == References == Category:UEFA Euro 2012
title: UEFA Euro 2012 knockout stage
